::Cygnar::
       He kneels on a hill behind some bushes watching the battle.  He begins 
analyzing the combatants.  Learning all he could about their strengths and 
weaknesses.  He sits back and shakes his head.  One of these days he'll die 
when he doesn't listen to me.  He sighs  and watches some more.

--part1_ac.2c908eb6.2a9e6fb4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
